trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around February 25th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out in the parking lot at work, returning from lunch break on second shift job. I noticed a bright object in the sky high up from the horizon. I was walking north and the object was in the northeastern sky. At first I thought to myself "what is Jupiter doing over there?" as I watched it got a little brighter then faded to a pinpoint in about 5 seconds. Could not tell if it was moving as I was walking. I was as bright as Jupiter..or Venus which was also visible in the western sky..about as large as Venus..a bright white that didn't change color, just slowly faded. I had first thought maybe I had witnessed a supernova...then I was waiting for all the lights to go out from a EMP..who knows I am reporting it here because I could find no other place to report it.
